notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework 7.7.0 is out. The release brings major improvements for widget set handling and a large amount of smaller enhancements and bug fixes.

With Maven, use Vaadin version 7.7.0.

  • Automatic widgetset creation and configuration.
  • Use Vaadin add-ons directly from cloud.
  • Added new LoginForm.
  • Lots of smaller improvements.
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 7.7.0 is out

notifications.body:
Join Vaadin Expert Matti Tahvonen and Salesforce Developer Evangelist René Winkelmeyer for a tour on how to integrate and interact with the Salesforce App Cloud using your Vaadin applications. Topics like authentication, authorization, API exploration and more will be covered.

Webinar takes place on Thursday October 13, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Take a REST by integrating Salesforce into Vaadin

notifications.body:
Vaadin Trainings Online EU (CET) on Sept 2016.

Why should I attend?

Check out the training calendar, read the course outline and sign up below.
notifications.title: Vaadin Online Training EU

notifications.body:
How do you like your Vaadin? What do you usually have as a side-dish with it? Where do you find your recipes for awesome apps?

Results will be public info in the blog so you can see how others have answered. And we'll learn more about the community at the same time.

Help Vaadin by answering this one page survey.
notifications.title: Vaadin Community Survey

notifications.body:
Progressive Web Applications are bridging the gap between web and native, allowing you to build web applications that are able to integrate with the operating system while still maintaining the easy access and sharing what the web offers. In this webinar we will demystify Progressive Web Apps – explain what they are and show you how to get started with building your own PWA.

Webinar takes place on Thursday September 15, 2016 @ 7PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Building Progressive Web Applications

notifications.body:
What is Spring? How can dependency injection help you to build better UI code? How does Spring Boot change the way you develop Java web apps? This and much more is answered in this Spring + Vaadin webinar, where Stéphane Nicoll (Pivotal) and Matti Tahvonen (Vaadin) show you how to build a modern Spring Boot application, that connects to a traditional database using Spring Data JPA and shows a nice single-page UI using Vaadin.

Webinar takes place on Tuesday October 18, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Java web apps with Spring and Vaadin

notifications.body:
What is dependency injection and why should you use it? In this webinar you’ll learn about what alternatives there are for using dependency injection in a Java App. We’ll also look at how Vaadin supports CDI and Spring autowiring for doing dependency injection. Join Peter Lehto and Matti Tahvonen from Vaadin on this webinar by signing up to this webinar.

Webinar takes place on Thursday October 6, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Dependency Injection Alternatives with Vaadin

notifications.body: Vaadin Framework, Vaadin Framework Best Practices, and Vaadin Framework Client-Side trainings are coming to Newark, U.S. in September.
notifications.title: Vaadin Trainings in Newark, U.S.

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?

notifications.body: Want to meet other Vaadin developers in Bogota and hear the latest in good company while having something to eat and drink?
notifications.title: Join Meetup Group Bogota
